item.description:
Meetup and Music!
Monday, December 8, 2008
11:30am to 12:30pm

The first Meetup and Music was a total success, and you've asked to do it again! SO, here we are!

Meet other local parents who are into their kids, love music, and love to have fun. We will be using music activities from The Music Class, Inc http://www.themusiccl....

Perfect for parents of babies, toddlers, preschoolers, and kindergarteners.

Join us for a meet and greet, music and movement activities, and food

MusicMakers Academy
517 Hartford Road
Manchester
(860) 646-3096

Note: Added Bonus for Meetup #2! We actually offer this class more formally, 45 minutes per week, 4 sessions per year (10 weeks per session), and have a BLAST in class. SO, As an added bonus, anyone attending the meetup will qualify at the Moms Club discount, which is 10% off of the tuition for the class. If you refer a friend to the meetup and they sign up for a class, you will get $10 off your session!

group.name: The Greater Hartford Area Parents Meetup Group

item.name: Meetup and Music 2
